short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you have a word that sounds rather dull? Or pheraps it simply doesn't fit your writing? The answer? SF!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This cool and unique looking extension will help you find the synonym of any word! It's easy to use and intuitive, and can give you definitions for your words as well! If there is a word in the official English dictionary, Synonym Finder will have it. Enjoy!
